sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The EsounD package contains esd, esdcat, esdctl, esdloop, esdmon, esdrec, esdsample and libesd libraries.

sect3.title: esd
sect3.para: esd is the Enlightened Sound Daemon.

sect3.title: esdcat
sect3.para: esdcat plays a RAW audio stream through the daemon.

sect3.title: esdctl
sect3.para: esdctl controls certain aspects of the sound daemon.

sect3.title: esdloop
sect3.para: esdloop is test scaffolding for sample cache, loop, and free.

sect3.title: esdmon
sect3.para: esdmon outputs the mixed stream from the daemon.

sect3.title: esdrec
sect3.para: esdrec outputs from the sound device's current input.

sect3.title: esdsample
sect3.para: esdsample is test scaffolding for sample cache, play back, and free.

sect3.title: esd libraries
sect3.para: libesd libraries contain the functions used by esd.
